page.title: 06WHAPLODE DROVE-AGRICULTURE 2
page.content: The oldest farming family we can trace back are the Lawsons who live at Shepeau Stow and used to be the millers.In the area there are 8 or 9 big farms.The land is farmed by a few men and a lot of expensive machinery.Some fertilizer,pest controller and weed killer are put on by tractors and some by air.Some people are worried about breathing in chemicals.Some people think chemicals get into our food and water and don't do us any good.Some of the chemicals people spray on crops go on to other people's crops.There is a worry that we are growing too much grain and we shall not know what to do with it.There is a worry that machinery is taking over all the jobs.People are worried that we have pulled down all the trees and hedges and animals have nowhere to live.
